snippet: The nation’s top auto safety regulator, Mark R. Rosekind, said one of his family’s cars was being recalled to fix a faulty Takata airbag.
abstract: Mark R Rosekind, head of National Highway Traffic Safety Admin, says parts to fix faulty Takata airbag in one of his family's cars were unavailable; says incident helps him understand what other owners of recalled cars are experiencing.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s top auto safety regulator, Mark R. Rosekind, said one of his family’s cars was being recalled to fix a faulty Takata airbag.

headline.main: Safety Chief’s Family Car Recalled for a Takata Airbag
headline.print_headline: Safety Chief’s Family Car Recalled for a Takata Airbag
